title: A Whippoorwill in the Woods - grosbeak is similar

content.question: For the speaker, the rose-breasted grosbeak and the whippoorwill are similar in that they both

choices.label: have the ability to disturb people's sleep
stand out as individuals amid their surroundings
symbolize the individuality of the speaker
are natural creatures that seem to violate the laws of nature

content.answer: stand out as individuals amid their surroundings

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain the function of contrasts within a text.
